greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of coefficient in the interpolation polynomial for initial values of the factorial, read by row.
formula: D(n, k) in Sum{k=0..n}N(n, k)/D(n, k)*m^k=m!, m=0..n, with reduced fraction N(n, k)/D(n, k) and N(n, k) is A103361. D(n, k)=a(n*(n+3)/2-k).
results.author: Nikolaus Meyberg (Nikolaus.Meyberg(AT)t-online.de), Feb 02 2005
